name: nebulousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not being clear and having no form: the blurry nebulousness of a satellite weather map Nebulousness is becoming the defining aesthetic of much contemporary art. See
nebulous
More examplesFewer examplesHe could see absolutely nothing but a pale nebulousness at his feet.Nebulousness does not always come from the writer.The nebulousness of the project makes it difficult for anyone to make a straightforward attack on it.
